content.description: Two weeks ago, Jaymes was full of energy, talking quickly, and staying up all night creating art. Now, Jaymes has no appetite, feels sad, and has difficulty concentrating.
content.question: Which of the following psychological disorders would Jaymes most likely be diagnosed with?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
